title: The most popular licenses for each language in 2023
description: The 2023 report of the licenses in use by the biggest package managers highlights the need to educate developers on the importance of licensing information. While many developers know that Open Source software forms the backbone of modern development, the data shows that much of their software is shared (and most likely also used) without a license.

authors.name: Nick Vidal
authors.title: Community Manager at Open Source Initiative
